Sentencas: Eine Reformer-Nachbrenner-Einheit fur den Einsatz in einem Festoxidbrennstoffzellensystem wird vorgestellt.
Titulo: Production of Synthesis Gas from Biogas - Reactor Design and Integration into a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: Mittels des Verfahrens der oxidativen trockenen Reformierung kann aus Biogas ein Synthesegas mit einer hohen Energiedichte erzeugt werden.
Titulo: Production of Synthesis Gas from Biogas - Reactor Design and Integration into a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: Der fur den Reformierungsprozess benotigte Warmestrom kann durch eine systeminterne Warmenutzung bereitgestellt werden.
Titulo: Production of Synthesis Gas from Biogas - Reactor Design and Integration into a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: Anschlie ss end an einen Komponententest erfolgt die Integration in ein Festoxidbrennstoffzellensystem.
Titulo: Production of Synthesis Gas from Biogas - Reactor Design and Integration into a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: Der im Rahmen einer thermodynamischen Analyse ermittelte, im Systembetrieb mogliche, elektrische Wirkungsgrad wird experimentell validiert.
Titulo: Production of Synthesis Gas from Biogas - Reactor Design and Integration into a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: A reformer-afterburner unit for integration into a solid oxide fuell cell system is introduced.
Titulo: Production of Synthesis Gas from Biogas - Reactor Design and Integration into a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: Synthesis gas of high energy density can be produced by oxidative dry reforming of biogas.
Titulo: Production of Synthesis Gas from Biogas - Reactor Design and Integration into a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: The required heat for the reforming can be provided by internal heat use.
Titulo: Production of Synthesis Gas from Biogas - Reactor Design and Integration into a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: Subsequent to component testing, the unit is integrated into a solid oxide fuel cell system.
Titulo: Production of Synthesis Gas from Biogas - Reactor Design and Integration into a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell System

Sentencas: The electrical efficiency of the system confirmed the results of a conducted thermodynamic analysis.
